degree_to_step(degree)[source]¶
detect_contours(overwrite=False, p_radius=27, p_inc_step=1, warm_core_size=3, T_drop_step=1, dis_cores=1, dis_mslp_min=3)[source]¶

adapted from Murakami 2015

Required Thresholds: dis_mslp_min: float [deg]: minimal distance between mslp minima p_radius: float [deg]: maximum radius for mslp closed contours p_inc_step: float [hPa]: step for mslp contours warm_core_size: float [deg]: maximal radius of warm core contours T_drop_step: float [K]: step for Ta contours dis_cores: float [deg]: maximal distances between vort max and mslp min (mslp min and warm core)

detect_knutson2007(thr_vort=3.5000000000000004e-05, dis_vort_max=4, dis_cores=2, thr_MSLP_inc=4, dis_MSLP_inc=5, thr_T_drop=0.8, dis_T_drop=5, tc_size=7, overwrite=False)[source]¶
find_closed_contours(field, y, x, step=2, search_radius=30, n_contours=None, method='min')[source]¶

finds closed contours around center center is supposed to be a minimum
